Package fr.upmc.datacenter.software.admissioncontroller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Admission
    This class Admission implements the interface AdmissionI witch offers the services that we transit between the components ApplicationContainer and the AdmissionControllerComponent, this interface allows us to update the state of the components using the information collected in the transaction.
    AdmissionController
    Description This component AdmissionControllerComponent receives the requests from the Costumers in this context we can consider Costumers as ApplicationContainer who want to host their applications RequestI of the RequestGenerator. the controller can accept if there is some available resources or refuse if all computers are busy on handling the requests of other Costumers.
    PreviousAdmissionController
    Description This component AdmissionControllerComponent receives the requests from the Costumers in this context we can consider Costumers as ApplicationContainer who want to host their applications RequestI of the RequestGenerator. the controller can accept if there is some available resources or refuse if all computers are busy on handling the requests of other Costumers.
    ResourceInspector
    Description this component ResourceInspector interacts with the DataProvider to request availability of resources in the DataCenter, he can inspects the abstract values of performances stored
